events.title: Intro to HTML & CSS — Study Group
events.description: A hands-on workshop for beginners covering semantic HTML and responsive CSS.

events.title: AI for Beginners: Building Chatbots
events.description: An intro-level talk covering practical AI APIs and how to prototype chatbots.

events.title: Project Clinic: Portfolio Reviews
events.description: Bring your project and get feedback from mentors and peers.

events.title: JavaScript Deep Dive — Async & Promises
events.description: Explore asynchronous programming patterns in JavaScript with hands-on coding exercises.

events.title: UI/UX Design Principles Workshop
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of user-centered design and prototyping tools.

events.title: Python for Data Science — Study Group
events.description: Introduction to data analysis with Python libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib.

events.title: Tech Career Panel: Breaking into IT
events.description: Hear from professionals about career paths in software engineering and IT support.

events.title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
events.description: Build your first cross-platform mobile app using Flutter and Dart.

events.title: Cybersecurity Basics — Protecting Your Data
events.description: Learn about common cyber threats and how to safeguard your personal information.

events.title: Hackathon Kickoff: Smart City Solutions
events.description: Collaborate on projects that address urban challenges with technology-driven solutions.

events.title: Intro to Git & GitHub
events.description: Learn version control basics and how to collaborate on projects using GitHub.

events.title: Women in Tech Networking Night
events.description: Connect with women professionals and students in technology fields.

events.title: Cloud Computing with AWS — Beginner Session
events.description: Get started with Amazon Web Services and learn about cloud infrastructure basics.

events.title: Tech for Social Good — Panel Discussion
events.description: Explore how technology can be leveraged to solve community and social challenges.

events.title: Final Project Showcase — Student Presentations
events.description: Students present their completed projects to peers, mentors, and community members.
